comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Laurette Taylor the American stage and movie actress. John Hartley Manners, the Irish playwright, was her husband. There's also this beautiful picture in the LOC P&P collection: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/trialsanderrors/4559997713/]

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of May 27, 1914 reported that Taylor would play Peg in Peg O' My Heart for the 600th time that evening and that she and Manners would sail for England in a few days. select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00913FD345D1373... This is likely taken at the beginning of that trip.
